mapper.select:
SELECT a.REC_ID as "recId", a.TRAIN_NO as "trainNo", a.TOTAL_MILES as "totalMiles", a.COMPLETE_DATE as "completeDate", a.ORG_TYPE as "orgType", a.OPERATOR as "operator", a.CONFIRMOR as "confirmor", a.REMARK as "remark", a.DOC_ID as "docId", a.REC_CREATOR as "recCreator", a.REC_CREATE_TIME as "recCreateTime", a.REC_REVISOR as "recRevisor", a.REC_REVISE_TIME as "recReviseTime", a.REC_DELETOR as "recDeletor", a.REC_DELETE_TIME as "recDeleteTime", a.DELETE_FLAG as "deleteFlag", a.ARCHIVE_FLAG as "archiveFlag", a.REC_STATUS as "recStatus", a.EXT1 as "ext1", a.EXT2 as "ext2", a.EXT3 as "ext3", a.EXT4 as "ext4", a.EXT5 as "ext5", a.EXT6 as "ext6", a.EXT7 as "ext7" FROM T_GEARBOX_CHANGE_OIL a LEFT JOIN T_EQUIPMENT b on b.EQUIP_NAME=a.TRAIN_NO and b.DELETE_FLAG='0' and b.MAJOR_CODE='07' WHERE 1=1 and a.DELETE_FLAG='0'
and a.TRAIN_NO like '%' || #{trainNo} || '%'
ORDER BY a.REC_CREATE_TIME desc

SELECT a.REC_ID as "recId", a.TRAIN_NO as "trainNo", a.TOTAL_MILES as "totalMiles", a.COMPLETE_DATE as "completeDate", a.ORG_TYPE as "orgType", a.OPERATOR as "operator", a.CONFIRMOR as "confirmor", a.REMARK as "remark", a.DOC_ID as "docId", a.REC_CREATOR as "recCreator", a.REC_CREATE_TIME as "recCreateTime", a.REC_REVISOR as "recRevisor", a.REC_REVISE_TIME as "recReviseTime", a.REC_DELETOR as "recDeletor", a.REC_DELETE_TIME as "recDeleteTime", a.DELETE_FLAG as "deleteFlag", a.ARCHIVE_FLAG as "archiveFlag", a.REC_STATUS as "recStatus", a.EXT1 as "ext1", a.EXT2 as "ext2", a.EXT3 as "ext3", a.EXT4 as "ext4", a.EXT5 as "ext5", a.EXT6 as "ext6", a.EXT7 as "ext7" FROM T_GEARBOX_CHANGE_OIL a LEFT JOIN T_EQUIPMENT b on b.EQUIP_NAME=a.TRAIN_NO and b.DELETE_FLAG='0' and b.MAJOR_CODE='07' WHERE a.REC_ID=#{id}
SELECT REC_CREATOR as "recCreator" FROM T_GEARBOX_CHANGE_OIL WHERE REC_ID=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_GEARBOX_CHANGE_OIL ( REC_ID, TRAIN_NO, COMPLETE_DATE, ORG_TYPE, OPERATOR, CONFIRMOR, REMARK, DOC_ID, REC_CREATOR, REC_CREATE_TIME, REC_REVISOR, REC_REVISE_TIME, REC_DELETOR, REC_DELETE_TIME, DELETE_FLAG, ARCHIVE_FLAG, REC_STATUS, TOTAL_MILES, EXT1, EXT2, EXT3, EXT4, EXT5, EXT6, EXT7 ) VALUES ( #{recId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{completeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{confirmor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recRevisor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recReviseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recDeletor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recDeleteTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '0', #{archiveFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalMiles,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext7,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert ALL
INTO T_GEARBOX_CHANGE_OIL ( REC_ID, TRAIN_NO, COMPLETE_DATE, ORG_TYPE, OPERATOR, CONFIRMOR, REMARK, DOC_ID, REC_CREATOR, REC_CREATE_TIME, REC_REVISOR, REC_REVISE_TIME, REC_DELETOR, REC_DELETE_TIME, DELETE_FLAG, ARCHIVE_FLAG, REC_STATUS, TOTAL_MILES, EXT1, EXT2, EXT3, EXT4, EXT5, EXT6, EXT7 ) VALUES ( #{oil.recId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oil.trainNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oil.completeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oil.orgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oil.operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oil.confirmor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oil.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oil.docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oil.recCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oil.recCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oil.recRevisor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oil.recReviseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oil.recDeletor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oil.recDeleteTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '0', #{oil.archiveFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oil.recStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oil.totalMiles,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oil.ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oil.ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oil.ext3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oil.ext4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oil.ext5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oil.ext6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oil.ext7,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
SELECT * FROM dual
mapper.select:
SELECT a.REC_ID as "recId", a.TRAIN_NO as "trainNo", a.TOTAL_MILES as "totalMiles", a.COMPLETE_DATE as "completeDate", a.ORG_TYPE as "orgType", a.OPERATOR as "operator", a.CONFIRMOR as "confirmor", a.REMARK as "remark", a.DOC_ID as "docId", a.REC_CREATOR as "recCreator", a.REC_CREATE_TIME as "recCreateTime", a.REC_REVISOR as "recRevisor", a.REC_REVISE_TIME as "recReviseTime", a.REC_DELETOR as "recDeletor", a.REC_DELETE_TIME as "recDeleteTime", a.DELETE_FLAG as "deleteFlag", a.ARCHIVE_FLAG as "archiveFlag", a.REC_STATUS as "recStatus", a.EXT1 as "ext1", a.EXT2 as "ext2", a.EXT3 as "ext3", a.EXT4 as "ext4", a.EXT5 as "ext5", a.EXT6 as "ext6", a.EXT7 as "ext7" FROM T_GEARBOX_CHANGE_OIL a LEFT JOIN T_EQUIPMENT b on b.EQUIP_NAME=a.TRAIN_NO and b.DELETE_FLAG='0' and b.MAJOR_CODE='07' WHERE 1=1 and a.DELETE_FLAG='0'
and a.TRAIN_NO like '%' || #{trainNo} || '%'
ORDER BY a.REC_CREATE_TIME desc
